Package chapter3

Examples using Message Authentication Codes (MACs) and Message Digests.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CipherMacExample Message without tampering with MAC (DES), encryption AES in CTR mode
DigestIOExample Basic IO example using SHA1
MGF1 mask generator function, as described in PKCS1v2.
PKCS5Scheme1 A basic implementation of PKCS #5 Scheme 1.
PKCS5Scheme1Test Basic test of the PKCS #5 Scheme 1 implementation.
TamperedDigestExample Tampered message, encryption with digest, AES in CTR mode
TamperedExample Tampered message, plain encryption, AES in CTR mode
TamperedWithDigestExample Tampered message, encryption with digest, AES in CTR mode
TamperedWithHMacExample Tampered message with HMac, encryption AES in CTR mode
Utils General utilities for the third chapter examples.
 

Package chapter3 Description

Examples using Message Authentication Codes (MACs) and Message Digests.
